name: Jungle Jorney
description: Jungle Jorney - platformer with a pleasant musical accompaniment. The main character must find a key at each level to open the door to the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz or higer Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 135 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higer Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz or higer Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 135 MB available space
